participant_abstract.sent: A good meeting, new research in the market was presented allowing the group to make choices on the concepts for the remote.
The ability to accomplish the various concepts with available components and how the components react was decided.
A prototype has been agreed to, and is now under construction.

participant_actions.sent: Designers are working on a prototype.
Marketing expert will work on a product evaluation.

participant_problems.sent: Limitations to different concepts due to materials or energy source restrictions.
